name: tab-cleaner
description: Automatically closes inactive tabs to keep your browser clean and fast. Track tab activity and set custom timeouts.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run package
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json background.js popup.html popup.js options.html options.js dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.validate: npm run validate-manifest && npm run lint
scripts.version-bump: npm version patch && npm run sync-version
scripts.prepare-release: npm run version-bump && npm run build

author: Jake Spurlock
